sources.title: Secret of the Wings
sources.description:
The war ended long ago, but for Nadezhda a former pilot, only those years were filled with true meaning. She deeply experiences discord with reality, the lack of contact with her daughter. She can't adapt to this peaceful, everyday life, and the piercing desire to fly does not fade within her...

IMDb: 7.6

Year of production: 1966

Director: Shepitko Larisa
Scriptwriters: Yezhov Valentin, Ryazantseva Natalia
Composer: Ledenev Roman
Camerame: Slabnevich Igor
Production designer: Plastinkin Ivan

Cast: Rimma Markova, Evgeny Evstigneev, Leonid Dyachkov, Sergey Nikonenko, Zhanna Bolotova, Maya Bulgakova, Panteleimon Krymov, Olga Gobzeva, Nikolay Grabbe, Yuri Medvedev, Vladimir Gorelov, Arkady Trusov, Zhanna Aleksandrova, Georgy Kovrov

metadata.Plot: Tinker Bell finds herself crossing into the Winter Woods. There she meets Periwinkle and together they find the magical powers that their wings obtain. They have to save the Pixie Tree from a dark winter, but something horrible happens to Tinker Bell, will the wing power fix it?
metadata.Writer: Bobs Gannaway, Peggy Holmes, Ryan Rowe
metadata.Actors: Mae Whitman, Lucy Hale, Timothy Dalton
